title: Unlock PDF | Remove Passwords from PDFs
description: Upload a secured PDF, enter the password once, and download an unlocked copy ready for printers, OCR, and e-sign tools.

openGraph.title: Unlock PDFs Online
openGraph.description: Strip PDF passwords locally and export a clean version in seconds.

twitter.title: Unlock PDF
twitter.description: Remove PDF passwords before sharing or archiving.

structuredData.name: Unlock a password-protected PDF
structuredData.description: Steps to remove open-password enforcement from PDFs when you already know the password.

step.name: Upload the locked PDF
step.text: Drag a PDF up to 20 MB that currently requires a password to open.

step.name: Enter the password
step.text: Provide the existing open password so the file can be decrypted locally.

step.name: Download the unlocked copy
step.text: Export a new PDF without password protection and share it with teammates or tools.
